label: clinical_signal_03_dx_renal_biomarker_study_018
content:

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: RB-PD-1833
  - Description: Blood pressure measurement not recorded at visit
  - Severity: minor
- PD ID: RB-PD-1826
  - Description: Urine sample collection outside 24h window
  - Severity: moderate

### Events
- Central lab urine biomarker batch analysis completed for Week 18
- DSMB safety data snapshot prepared

### Notes
- Week 18: Renal biomarker collection on schedule. 86 subjects enrolled across 4 cohorts. eGFR and urinary biomarkers within expected variability.
